item.title: LEOCoin launches LEOxCHANGE in Hong Kong
item.description: Source: LEOxCHANGE. Andersson speaks at the launch of LEOxCHANGE in Hong Kong, emphasizing the high security of LEOCoin and its ability to protect consumer privacy. A new digital currency has entered the market. Launched in London on March 25, 2015, LEOCoin is reportedly recognized by other digital currency exchanges and boasts the support of approximately 100,000 entrepreneurs. The company behind LEOCoin, UK-based LEO (Learning Enterprises Organisation), provides entrepreneurship and leadership training via online tutoring, e-learning platforms, and in-person seminars.
